query.statement:
SELECT SUBSTR(A.UAD,5,2)||'월' MON, A.PJT, A.HNO, A.SPT, A.NAM, A.UPN, CASE WHEN A.KND > '' THEN 'FM' ELSE 'POG' END KND, A.HYN, A.HMT, A.JKH, SAPHEE.CODE_CONV(A.MANDT,'CS179',A.HEP) HEP, A.DYN, A.DMT, A.ZSPEC12, A.ZSPEC2, A.BLD_NM, VALUE(SAPHEE.CODE_CONV(A.MANDT,'CS115',A.ARA),'') ARA_NM, VALUE(SAPHEE.CODE_CONV(A.MANDT,'VKGRP',A.VKGRP),'') TEM_NM, VALUE(SAPHEE.GET_VENDER_N_NAME(A.MANDT,A.BSU),'') BSU_NM, VALUE(SAPHEE.GET_BOSU_INWON(A.MANDT,A.BPM),'') BPM_NM, VALUE(SAPHEE.GET_BOSU_INWON(A.MANDT,A.JUJ),'') JUJ_NM, VALUE(SAPHEE.GET_BOSU_INWON(A.MANDT,A.BUJ),'') BUJ_NM, A.IGD, A.ISD, CASE WHEN VALUE(A.UHJ_G,'') > '' THEN A.UHJ_G WHEN VALUE(A.BMT_G,'') > '' THEN A.BMT_G ELSE A.IGD END IDD, A.MGM, A.BGT_G, A.BMT_G, A.MIM, A.BGT, A.BMT, A.USD_G, A.UHJ_G, A.LUHJ, A.GNO_G, A.USD, A.UHJ, A.ADT, A.AMT, A.GNO, '' FSD, '' GBN_NM, A.SLA, '갱신계약' HST_NM, A.P1E, A.EPNAME, A.TEA, A.P1B, (SELECT CS126_UMR FROM SAPHEE.ZCST126 WHERE MANDT = #G_MANDT# AND CS126_DDT = '' AND CS126_PST = 'A6' AND CS126_PJT = A.PJT AND CS126_HNO = A.HNO AND CS126_USD < A.USD ORDER BY CS126_USD DESC FETCH FIRST 1 ROW ONLY) PUMR, --종전유상계약만료일 (SELECT CS126_AMT FROM SAPHEE.ZCST126 WHERE MANDT = #G_MANDT# AND CS126_DDT = '' AND CS126_PST = 'A6' AND CS126_PJT = A.PJT AND CS126_HNO = A.HNO AND CS126_USD < A.USD ORDER BY CS126_USD DESC FETCH FIRST 1 ROW ONLY) PAMT --종전유상계약금액 FROM ( SELECT A.PJT, A.HNO, A.ARA, A.BSU, A.BPM, A.JUJ, A.BUJ, A.BLD_NM, B.CS101_IGD IGD, B.CS101_ISD ISD, VALUE(C.GBGT,'') BGT_G, VALUE(C.GBMT,'') BMT_G, VALUE(D.BGT,'') BGT, VALUE(D.BMT,'') BMT, VALUE(E.GUSD,'') USD_G, VALUE(E.GUHJ,'') UHJ_G, A.LUHJ, VALUE(E.GGNO,'') GNO_G, A.UPN, A.CST, A.USD, A.UAD, A.UHJ1 UHJ, A.ADT, A.GNO, A.AMT, A.SLA, A.KND, A.HYN, A.HMT, A.JKH, A.HEP, A.DYN, A.DMT, Z1.ZSITE_NM SPT, Z1.KUNNR_NM NAM, Z.ZMUSAOCNT MGM, Z.ZMUSAOCNT2 MIM, Z.ZSPEC12 ZSPEC12, Z.ZSPEC2 ZSPEC2, ZC.CS121_P1E||ZC.CS121_P2E P1E, ZC.EPNAME EPNAME, ZC.CS121_TEA TEA, ZC.CS121_P1B||ZC.CS121_P2B P1B, ZW.VKGRP, Z.MANDT FROM ( SELECT A.CS126_PJT PJT, A.CS126_HNO HNO, A.ARA, A.BSU, A.BPM, A.JUJ, A.BUJ, A.BLD_NM, A.UPN, A.CST, A.USD, A.UAD, A.UHJ UHJ1, A.ADT, A.GNO, A.AMT, VALUE(B.UHJ,'') UHJ, A.SLA, A.KND, A.HYN, A.HMT, A.JKH, A.HEP, A.DYN, A.DMT, VALUE(C.LUHJ,'') LUHJ, ROW_NUMBER() OVER(PARTITION BY A.CS126_PJT, A.CS126_HNO, A.CS126_GRP ORDER BY VALUE(B.UHJ,'') DESC) ROWN FROM ( SELECT A.CS126_GRP, A.CS126_PJT, A.CS126_HNO, A.ARA, A.BSU, A.UPN, A.CST, A.USD, A.UAD, A.UHJ, A.ADT, A.GNO, A.AMT, A.BPM, A.JUJ, A.BUJ, A.BLD_NM, A.SLA, A.KND, A.HYN, A.HMT, A.JKH, A.HEP, A.DYN, A.DMT FROM ( SELECT A.CS126_PJT, A.CS126_HNO, A.CS126_GRP, MAX(B.ARA) ARA, MAX(B.BSU) BSU, MAX(B.ARA_B) ARA_B, MAX(B.BSU_B) BSU_B, MAX(B.BPM) BPM, MAX(B.JUJ) JUJ, MAX(B.BUJ) BUJ, MAX(VALUE(CO.CTEXT2,'')) BLD_NM, MAX(A.CS126_UPN) UPN, MAX(A.CS126_CST) CST, MIN(A.CS126_USD) USD, MIN(CASE WHEN A.CS126_ADT < A.CS126_USD THEN A.CS126_USD ELSE A.CS126_ADT END) UAD, MAX(A.CS126_UHJ) UHJ, MAX(A.CS126_ADT) ADT, MAX(A.CS126_GNO) GNO, SUM(A.CS126_AMT) AMT, MAX(A.CS126_SLA) SLA, MAX(A.CS126_KND) KND, MAX(A.CS126_HYN) HYN, SUM(A.CS126_HMT) HMT, SUM(A.CS126_JKH) JKH, MAX(A.CS126_HEP) HEP, MAX(A.CS126_DYN) DYN, SUM(A.CS126_DMT) DMT, VALUE(MAX(C.CS157_IKD),'00000000') IKD FROM SAPHEE.ZCST126 A LEFT OUTER JOIN SAPHEE.ZCST157 C ON A.MANDT = C.MANDT AND A.CS126_UPN = C.CS157_UPN AND A.CS126_CST = C.CS157_CST AND A.CS126_PJT = C.CS157_PJT AND A.CS126_HNO = C.CS157_HNO AND C.CS157_IKD >= #DAT4#, SAPHEE.ZCST111 B LEFT OUTER JOIN SAPHEE.ZLCODE CO ON B.MANDT = CO.MANDT AND B.BLD = CO.CODE2 AND CO.LANG = 'ko' AND CO.CODE1 = 'CS123' LEFT OUTER JOIN SAPHEE.ZWBT010 ZW ON B.MANDT = ZW.MANDT AND B.BSU = ZW.LGORT AND ZW.LGORT > '' WHERE A.MANDT = #G_MANDT# AND A.MANDT = B.MANDT AND A.CS126_PJT = B.PJT AND A.CS126_HNO = B.HNO AND A.CS126_ARA > '' AND A.CS126_BSU > '' AND A.CS126_DDT = '' AND A.CS126_PST = 'A6' AND A.CS126_GKD = '2' AND SUBSTR(A.CS126_HNO,1,1) NOT IN ('J','G') AND B.EXC = '' AND A.CS126_GND = 'D' AND CASE WHEN A.CS126_ADT < A.CS126_USD THEN A.CS126_USD ELSE A.CS126_ADT END BETWEEN SUBSTR(#DAT#,1,4) || '0101' AND #DAT#
AND A.CS126_PJT = #PJT#
AND A.CS126_ARA = #ARA#
AND A.CS126_BSU = #BSU#
AND A.CS126_BPM = #BPM#
AND ZW.VKGRP = #TEM#
GROUP BY A.CS126_PJT, A.CS126_HNO, A.CS126_GRP ) A ) A LEFT OUTER JOIN ( SELECT CS126_PJT, CS126_HNO, CS126_GRP, MIN(CS126_USD) USD, MAX(CS126_UHJ) UHJ FROM SAPHEE.ZCST126 WHERE MANDT = #G_MANDT# AND CS126_PST = 'A6' AND CS126_DDT = '' AND CS126_GND = 'D' AND CS126_UHJ < #DAT# AND CS126_ADT <= #DAT# GROUP BY CS126_PJT, CS126_HNO, CS126_GRP ) B ON A.CS126_PJT = B.CS126_PJT AND A.CS126_HNO = B.CS126_HNO AND A.UAD > B.UHJ LEFT OUTER JOIN ( SELECT CS126_PJT PJT, CS126_HNO HNO, MAX(CS126_UHJ) LUHJ FROM SAPHEE.ZCST126 WHERE MANDT = #G_MANDT# AND CS126_PST = 'A6' AND CS126_DDT = '' AND CS126_GND = 'D' AND CS126_ADT > '' GROUP BY CS126_PJT, CS126_HNO ) C ON A.CS126_PJT = C.PJT AND A.CS126_HNO = C.HNO ) A INNER JOIN SAPHEE.ZCST101 B ON B.MANDT = #G_MANDT# AND A.PJT = B.CS101_PJT AND A.HNO = B.CS101_HNO LEFT OUTER JOIN ( SELECT CS116_PJT PJT, CS116_HNO HNO, MIN(CS116_BGT) GBGT, MAX(CS116_BMT) GBMT FROM SAPHEE.ZCST116 WHERE MANDT = #G_MANDT# AND CS116_PST = 'A6' AND CS116_GND = 'A' AND CS116_BST <= #DAT# GROUP BY CS116_PJT, CS116_HNO ) C ON A.PJT = C.PJT AND A.HNO = C.HNO LEFT OUTER JOIN ( SELECT CS116_PJT PJT, CS116_HNO HNO, MIN(CS116_BGT) BGT, MAX(CS116_BMT) BMT FROM SAPHEE.ZCST116 WHERE MANDT = #G_MANDT# AND CS116_PST = 'A6' AND CS116_GND = 'B' AND CS116_BST <= #DAT# GROUP BY CS116_PJT, CS116_HNO ) D ON A.PJT = D.PJT AND A.HNO = D.HNO LEFT OUTER JOIN ( SELECT CS126_PJT PJT, CS126_HNO HNO, MIN(CS126_USD) GUSD, MAX(CS126_UHJ) GUHJ, MAX(CS126_GNO) GGNO FROM SAPHEE.ZCST126 WHERE MANDT = #G_MANDT# AND CS126_PST = 'A6' AND CS126_GND = 'C' AND CS126_DDT = '' AND CS126_ADT <= #DAT# GROUP BY CS126_PJT, CS126_HNO ) E ON A.PJT = E.PJT AND A.HNO = E.HNO INNER JOIN SAPHEE.ZMASTER01 Z1 ON Z1.MANDT = #G_MANDT# AND A.PJT = Z1.POSID INNER JOIN SAPHEE.ZMASTER02 Z ON Z.MANDT = #G_MANDT# AND A.PJT = Z.POSID AND A.HNO = SUBSTR(Z.POSID_1,7,3) LEFT OUTER JOIN SAPHEE.ZCST121 ZC ON ZC.MANDT = #G_MANDT# AND A.UPN = ZC.CS121_UPN AND A.CST = ZC.CS121_CST LEFT OUTER JOIN SAPHEE.ZWBT010 ZW ON ZW.MANDT = #G_MANDT# AND A.BSU = ZW.LGORT AND ZW.LGORT > '' WHERE A.ROWN = 1 AND A.UAD BETWEEN SUBSTR(#DAT#,1,4) || '0101' AND #DAT# AND SAPHEE.MONTH_BETWEEN(A.UAD,A.UHJ,'') < 2 AND A.UHJ > ''
AND A.PJT = #PJT#
AND A.ARA = #ARA#
AND A.BSU = #BSU#
AND A.BPM = #BPM#
AND ZW.VKGRP = #TEM#
) A WITH UR
